title.rendered: Texas Fireplace And Chimney Repair: Why Choose United Home Services?

content.rendered:
United Home Services is a family-owned group of Texas fireplace and chimney repair professionals. We have been inspecting, cleaning, and repairing chimneys and fireplaces for over 20 years. If you’re looking for a reliable chimney sweep in Texas, you have hundreds of options to choose from. So, what makes United Home Services better?

Our NCSG Certified Chimney Sweep Professionals 

Our team is, inarguably, the #1 reason why we have been able to expand across five states so quickly. All of our Texas fireplace and chimney repair experts are certified by the National Chimney Sweep Guild (NCSG), and they undergo regular training to keep their certificate updated.

But certifications and skills are not enough; our technicians are dedicated to provide the best possible customer experience as well. This is why we pride ourselves in our 100% customer satisfaction guarantee – if you’re not happy with our work, we will gladly refund every penny. 

Extensive Texas Fireplace and Chimney Repair Services

We offer complete care of residential fireplaces and chimneys, including:

  • Chimney and fireplace inspection
  • Chimney and fireplace cleaning
  • Woodstove installation
  • Annual restoration and repairs
  • Chimney waterproofing
  • Dryer vent cleaning
  • Gas log installation
  • Carbon monoxide alarm inspection
  • Chimney masonry repairs
  • Chimney flue cap installation

And much more!

Our service vans are always equipped to handle any of your chimney and fireplace servicing needs, regardless of when or where you call us. No matter the time, no matter the day, we will be there!

Whatever you need to improve your chimney and fireplace, and keep them running safe, we can do it with unmatched efficiency.

Customer Satisfaction is Everything For Us 

Fantastic job!!!!! Way exceeding my expectations. They were extremely thorough with the job and they were nice and professional and I am more than satisfied with their services. They really explained the process and professionally did the work. I will definitely recommend it!

–         Tal Ariel (A Satisfied Customer)

Clients come before anything else, period. When you book a Texas fireplace and chimney repair appointment with us, our technicians will come to your home to inspect your chimney and make suggestions as to what needs to be done.

Considering the ongoing COVID-19 pandemic, we are taking all the necessary precautions, which means our technicians will be wearing personal protective equipment such as face masks, face shields, gloves, and other professional gear to keep them and your family safe.

Nobody understands the importance of following strict safety standards better than us. As professional chimney sweeps, we know that neglected chimneys can lead to devastating fire accidents and carbon monoxide poisoning. So, we approach each home with utmost care and inspect both the fireplace and chimney thoroughly.

Call #1 Texas Fireplace And Chimney Repair Today 

Still not convinced that United Home Services offers the best chimney cleaning services in Texas? Check out hundreds of glowing reviews left by our customers and see for yourself that we truly walk the talk! 

If you have any questions or concerns, or you want to set up an appointment, call us at 866-850-0339 or reach us online.
